title: Kim K Reveals Her Biggest Pregnancy Craving
text: We already know what foods are a part of Kim Kardashian's Atkins diet, but now the E! star is dishing on the snacks she craved during her pregnancy with North West. As part of a Mobio Insider Q&A, the new mom confessed she couldn't resist a specific dairy product: "Mostly cheese, chili cheese fries, everything with cheese," she wrote when asked about her pregnancy cravings. But in general her junk food appetite is more sweet than savory. Kanye West's fiancée shared that her favorite treats are "Krispy Kreme doughnuts." As for her go-to restaurants, she says "It depends, Miami I love Macaluso's; NYC, I love Cipriani; LA, Casa Vega...it changes depending on the city!" NEWS: Inside Kim K's Atkins diet Kim also divulged some beauty tips for new moms. When asked how she manages to look so stunning, she replied: "Never lose time for you. Go to the gym, get a facial, or manicure to feel good so you can go home and be a good happy home." But the biggest beauty secret revealed during the Q&A? Kim wrote that she is already working on her sixth perfume and it is going to be a floral scent. "This rose fragrance we are developing is very special to me," she hinted. We can't wait to take a whiff! PHOTOS: Kim K's post-pregnancy style Your source for entertainment news, celebrities, celeb news, and ​celebrity gossip.
